title: General
fullText: Spa pools or tubs with a water capacity not exceeding 680 L shall comply with the requirements of Clause 6.2. A spa pool that is attached to a swimming or paddling pool shall be considered to be an extension to the swimming or paddling pool. NOTE: Electrical equipment installed behind a fixed panel that provides a degree of protection not less than IPX4, and to which access may only be gained by the use of a tool, would not be considered to be in a classified zone.
